name: Synth Drift (itch)
description:
This is a straightforward racing game. Race to the goal(s) before getting hit by spikes.

The game consists of 30 levels where you need to race as fast as you can and reach the goal(s). It’s getting gradually harder the further you progress. This is not a complex game but you need to be fast and agile.

Don’t idle for too long because spikes are closing in!

If you enjoyed this game, please consider purchasing one of my games on steam.

Follow me on twitter.
